summary: Website for Akashic Record practitioner and energy healer
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Ethereal hero background image with soft light rays and sacred geometry patterns suggesting spiritual energy (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Akashic Records symbol or mystical book icon for services section (akashic-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Energy healing hands illustration with glowing aura effect (healing-hands.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with hero section introducing the Akashic Record practitioner and energy healer services, including a welcoming headline, brief description of offerings, and call-to-action button
Create an About page describing what Akashic Records are, the healing methodology, and the practitioner's background and qualifications
Create a Services page listing available healing sessions, including Akashic Record readings, energy healing sessions, and any combined offerings with descriptions and duration information
Create a booking or contact form where visitors can request appointments or ask questions, capturing name, email, phone number, preferred service, and message
Create a testimonials or reviews section displaying client feedback about healing sessions and Akashic Record readings
Implement responsive navigation menu with links to Home, About, Services, Testimonials, and Contact pages

Apply a cohesive visual design with a calming, spiritual aesthetic featuring earthy tones (sage green, soft gold, warm neutrals), elegant serif typography for headings, and ethereal design elements that evoke healing and mysticism throughout the entire site

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for Akashic Record practitioner and energy healer
Implement backend storage for contact form submissions including timestamp, contact details, requested service, and message content
